question: Why wont my stomach stop makeing noises?
question_content:
Lately my stomach is always growling i dont know what it is, even after i eat like 20 or 30 minutes later it will start makeing noises again. 
Does anyone now what's wrong with my stomach or what i can do to make it stop.

answers.answer_content:
It could be any of the above, but mostlikely your stomach acid is just moving around the food its digesting, or possibly the food encased in your stomach is being a little bugger and your tummy is saying " Right, no nutrition in you so were gunna **** you out mate " 

Probably not the latter :)
The noises could just be your body digesting the food you  have just eaten
try drinking a ton of water. your stomach is telling you it wants more food.
well if your hungry when it does it then go eat it happens to me alot
